pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genome-Wide Regression P-Value (Gwrpv) // Computes the sample probability value (p-value) for the estimated coefficient from a standard genome-wide univariate regression. It computes the exact finite-sample p-value under the assumption that the measured phenotype (the dependent variable in the regression) has a known Bernoulli-normal mixture distribution. Finite- sample genome-wide regression p-values (Gwrpv) with a non- normally distributed phenotype (Gregory Connor and Michael O'Neill, bioRxiv 204727 doi:10.1101/204727).
